definition: to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在農業中佔很大部分的是種植業和畜牧業。

sentences.english: Even now, raising cattle is still one of the  leading branches of economy.
sentences.chinese: 即使時至今日，畜牧業仍然是經濟的主要部門之一。

sentences.english: My county is agricultural large county, stock raising is one of main economy origin of the farmer.
sentences.chinese: 我縣是農業大縣，畜牧業是農民的主要經濟來源之一。

sentences.english: The Wudi county of Shandong province is a big livestock county.
sentences.chinese: 山東省無棣縣是一個畜牧大縣。

sentences.english: China is famous for his stockbreeding all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 我國是世界上畜牧業資源最豐富的國家之一。

sentences.english: Tourism stockbreeding is the important component of tourism agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 觀光畜牧業是觀光農業的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Company existing high-level raising livestock and correlation specialist 16 people.
sentences.chinese: 公司現有高級畜牧及相關專業人員16人。

sentences.english: The stock farm is raising big horses for work in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 這個畜牧場在飼養幹農活的高頭大馬。

sentences.english: Poultry industry plan money work made important contribution to drive stock raising to develop.
sentences.chinese: 畜牧行業計財工作爲推動畜牧業發展作出了重要貢獻。

sentences.english: Poultry industry plan money work made important contribution to drive stock raising to develop.
sentences.chinese: 畜牧行業計財工作爲推動畜牧業發展作出了重要貢獻。

sentences.english: They depended on animal husbandry for their livelihood.
China is one of the cradles for animal husbandry in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我國是世界畜牧起源中心之一。

sentences.english: Tom has a cattle ranch in California.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆在加州有一個大畜牧場。

sentences.english: Livestock husbandry in grassland is the preponderant industry in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 草原畜牧業是內蒙古的優勢產業和基礎產業。

sentences.english: Meat rabbit industry is a very good feed-saving animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 肉兔產業是一個很好的節糧型畜牧業。

sentences.english: Grass is the food of livestock, and is the material foundation of the development of stockbreeding .
sentences.chinese: 牧草是家畜的食糧，是畜牧業發展的物質基礎。
